Title: Little Giants
Writer: James Ferguson (story), Robert Shallcross (story), James Ferguson (screenplay), Robert Shallcross (screenplay), Tommy Swerdlow (screenplay), Michael Goldberg (screenplay)
Actors: Rick Moranis, Ed O'Neill, Shawna Waldron, Devon Sawa
Plot: Misfits form their own opposing team to an elite peewee football team, coached by the elite team coach's brother.
